teams.bio: Sitting Commissioner. Builder of metrics, propaganda, and weekly receipts.
A franchise fueled by vibes, waiver claims, and the occasional miracle.
Former regime. Eternal rival. Still insists the Dark Ages were misunderstood.
Chaos in human form. Capable of genius and disaster within one drive.
A cursed username with cursed luck—until it isn’t.
Quiet competency. The kind that ends seasons without a sound.
Can score 180 or 80. Both are equally likely.
Fan favorite. Polarizing. Either a master plan or improv—no in between.
Trade energy constantly at DEFCON 2. A wild card with sharp edges.
Wins ugly and doesn’t apologize. Opponents report bad vibes.
Regular season terror. The playoffs are where myths go to die.
High ceiling. High volatility. Built to spike weeks and ruin dreams.
